text: ( bell rings )
Here we are, Golden Gate Park.
Hey, where's everybody going?
There's a huge concert.

A concert? Now that sounds
like fun, doesn't it, Ma?

Ah-ah-ah. No. We're not going
to no stinking concert.

We're going to have
a great time at the pier
like I used to with my friends.
Oh, you're missing out.

I met the love of my life
at that concert.

Unfortunately,
he met my brother.

They have two lovely kids
and live in Albuquerque,
where I'm not from.
Love of your life, huh?

Uh, excuse me.
Frisco, Phil, Fred,

could you do a little
less personal information

and a little more Pier 39?
And step on it.
It's a lever, ma'am.
Then pull on it.
Booker, what are you doing?

Yeah, passengers aren't
supposed to touch the lever.
I don't want to go to Pier 39.

No, no, no.
You're going to Pier 39.
You're going to love it.
I want to go to that concert.

You can go to a concert
anywhere, Booker.

I need you to see what's great
about San Francisco.

Maybe you could talk
without touching the lever?
You're going to stay with me.

- I'm going!
- You're staying!

- I'm going!
- You are staying!
Oh, snap!

This is why you don't touch
the lever.
All: Aah!
